title: **Beautiful 2 Bed 2 Bath + Study, Nursery, or Additional Bedroom!!**
posting_body: A wonderful SINGLE STORY house with a 2 CAR GARAGE and small FENCED YARD!
It is available starting in early August 2022.
It has 2 BEDROOMS and 2 BATHS + an ADDITIONAL ROOM that functions as a study, nursery, or third bedroom.
The house has an outstanding open floor plan with beautiful HARDWOOD FLOORS in the living/dining area.
The fenced yard is great for a small dog; a doggy door is even included!
All major appliances (WASHER, DRYER, STAINLESS STEEL REFRIGERATOR, STAINLESS STEEL DISHWASHER, BUILT-IN MICROWAVE, AND OVEN/RANGE) and an intruder alert system are included!
